root.name: bezierPoint()
root.description: Evalutes the Bezier at point t for points a, b, c, d. The parameter t varies between 0 and 1, a and d are points on the curve, and b and c are the control points. This can be done once with the x coordinates and a second time with the y coordinates to get the location of a bezier curve at t.

parameter.label: a
parameter.description: int or float: coordinate of first point on the curve

parameter.label: b
parameter.description: int or float: coordinate of first control point

parameter.label: c
parameter.description: int or float: coordinate of second control point

parameter.label: d
parameter.description: int or float: coordinate of second point on the curve
